name: LAST MAN STANDING
description: High School Seniors Chloe, Stephanie, Monae, and Nicole are best friends and are always ready, willing and able when it comes to protecting each other. However, Chloe’s world falls apart right before her eyes when the love of her life is executed by his rival, who is also her other boyfriend. She sinks into a deep depression and wishes she had died that night too, especially since she must keep the identity of his killer a secret – even from her best friends. When Chloe’s friends learn what really happened, they put their friendship to the test and go to the extreme to protect her, even if it meant they were putting their own lives in jeopardy. Join them as they walk the roads of Sex, Betrayal and Murder to prove who will be the Last Man Standing.
